foreignData.flavorText: „Vereint wird unser Gebrüll ganze Berge einebnen."
foreignData.name: Ajanis Auserwählte
foreignData.text: Immer wenn eine Verzauberung unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, bringe einen 2/2 weißen Katze-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel. Falls diese Verzauberung eine Aura ist, kannst du sie an den Spielstein anlegen.

foreignData.name: Elegido de Ajani
foreignData.text: Siempre que un encantamiento entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Felino blanca 2/2. Si ese encantamiento es un aura, puedes anexarlo a la ficha.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ensemble, notre rugissement pulvérisera les montagnes. »
foreignData.name: Élus d'Ajani
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'un enchantement arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 2/2 blanche Chat. Si cet enchantement est une aura, vous pouvez l'attacher au jeton.

foreignData.flavorText: "Insieme, il nostro ruggito spianerà le montagne."
foreignData.name: Prescelti di Ajani
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta un incantesimo entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Felino 2/2 bianca. Se quell'incantesimo è un'Aura, puoi assegnarla alla pedina.

foreignData.flavorText: 「団結すれば、我らが咆哮は山をも更地にするだろう。」
foreignData.name: アジャニに選ばれし者
foreignData.text: エンチャントが１つあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、白の２/２の猫・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。そのエンチャントがオーラである場合、あなたはそれをそのトークンにつけてもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 猫・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: "집결하라 형제들이여! 눈앞의 산이 두려움에 떨도록 포효하라!"
foreignData.name: 아자니의 정예병
foreignData.text: 부여마법이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 2/2 백색 고양이 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다. 그 부여마법이 마법진이라면, 당신은 그것을 그 토큰에 부착할 수 있다.

foreignData.name: Escolhidos de Ajani
foreignData.text: Toda vez que um encantamento entrar no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura branca 2/2 do tipo Felino. Se aquele encantamento for uma Aura, você poderá anexá-la à ficha.

foreignData.flavorText: «Единством наш прайд так силен, что его рык может горы сравнять с землей».
foreignData.name: Избранники Аджани
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда чары выходят на поле битвы под вашим контролем, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 2/2 белая Кошка. Если те чары являются Аурой, вы можете прикрепить их к той фишке.

foreignData.flavorText: 「团结起来，我们的吼声将夷平高山。」
foreignData.name: 阿耶尼的精卫
foreignData.text: 每当一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，将一个2/2白色的猫衍生生物放进战场。若该结界是灵气，你可以将它结附在该衍生物上。

foreignData.flavorText: 「團結起來，我們的吼聲將夷平高山。」
foreignData.name: 阿耶尼的精衛
foreignData.text: 每當一個結界在你的操控下進戰場時，將一個2/2白色的貓衍生生物放進戰場。若該結界是靈氣，你可以將它結附在該衍生物上。

name: Ajani's Chosen
originalText: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, put a 2/2 white Cat creature token onto the battlefield. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.

rulings.text: The ability doesn’t trigger until the enchantment enters the battlefield. This means that, for example, you can’t cast an Aura with enchant creature if there are no legal targets available, hoping to enchant the Cat token. Ajani’s Chosen itself, however, may be a legal target for the Aura.
If you cast an Aura targeting an opponent or a permanent controlled by an opponent, you control that Aura when it enters the battlefield. The ability of Ajani’s Chosen will trigger.
You may attach the Aura to the token only if it can legally enchant that token. For example, if the enchantment that entered the battlefield is an Aura with “enchant land,” it won’t move.

You may attach the Aura to the Cat token only if the Aura and the token are both on the battlefield when the triggered ability resolves. If the Aura leaves the battlefield before the ability resolves, it won’t become attached to the token. If the token leaves the battlefield before the ability resolves, the Aura won’t move.

text: Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token. If that enchantment is an Aura, you may attach it to the token.
